TABLE.NAME: local_teacher_submissions
TABLE.COMMENT: Store general information about each submission

FIELD.NAME: positiontitle
FIELD.COMMENT: Position occupied by the teacher (examples: lector universitar, conferenÈ›iar universitar, asistent universitar)

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: Email used by the teacher to track the activities

TABLE.NAME: local_teacher_items
TABLE.COMMENT: Store activities related to each submission

FIELD.NAME: sectionkey
FIELD.COMMENT: Represents the key to the section in which the following activity should be located, e.g. "didactic_activity"

FIELD.NAME: activitykey
FIELD.COMMENT: Key (from template json file) to identify what activity the item corresponds to

FIELD.NAME: activitysubkey
FIELD.COMMENT: Key to a subtype of activity defined in the template json file. It is optional, as not every activity has a subtype

FIELD.NAME: vars
FIELD.COMMENT: Stored in JSON format. Variables used to calculate the score for this submission item. If there are no variables, it will be just an empty json object.

FIELD.NAME: details
FIELD.COMMENT: Stored in JSON format. Details about an item (examples: denumirea platformei, numele coautorilor), variable structure based on the template json file

FIELD.NAME: evaluationscore
FIELD.COMMENT: The score entered by the committee

FIELD.NAME: urladdress
FIELD.COMMENT: Url address to the (file, page, ...) proof for this activity

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the parent table
